directions: In a large bowl, combine 1/3 cup of yellow cornmeal, 2/3 cup whole-wheat flour, 1/2 cup frozen blueberries, 1/2 cup milk, 1 mashed ripe banana, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 1 teaspoon baking powder (stir in more milk if the batter is too thick to pour). Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet on medium. Drop the batter in, 1/3 cup at a time; cook until the pancakes are golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
title: Wild- Blueberry Cornmeal Pancakes
